love-on-a-leash.Description: As a volunteer opportunity, I created a video for Love on Leash, a nonprofit organization that provides therapy dogs for local groups. This video is a slideshow featuring the dogs within the Therapeutic Paws of SE Wisconsin Facebook group.

a-midlife-crisis-but-in-college.PageTitle: A Midlife Crisis, But in College
a-midlife-crisis-but-in-college.Description: This video was created for the Design Salon 2020, a competition hosted by the UW Libraries that asked participants to submit and share their digital works. It's a video essay detailing the weird existential crisis I experienced earlier that year. Made of clips gathered over weeks using my phone, it's a personal, somber story contrasting with my usual comedic style.

videos-for-uw-madison-memes-for-milk-chu.PageTitle: Videos For UW-Madison Memes For Milk Chugging Teens
videos-for-uw-madison-memes-for-milk-chu.Description: For three years during college, I helped run the UW-Madison Facebook meme page called UW-Madison Memes for Milk Chugging Teens. Throughout, I created many videos showcasing my skills with Adobe creative apps like Premiere Pro, After Effects, and Photoshop.

videoURLs.title: Mr.BongoSide
videoURLs.desc: Just a regular Saturday night in Madtown. I call this one "Mr. BongoSide."

videoURLs.title: Look Out, Looks Like Bucky Badger Likes You
UW-Madison Mifflin Block Party | FRIENDS Parody
videoURLs.desc: It's that time of the year! Never been to the Mifflin Block Party held at UW-Madison? Worry no more! This video should give you a taste of what you can encounter when at the event!

videoURLs.title: Everyone Is Here
videoURLs.desc: Can't wait for the new Super Smash Bros. It looks like they're adding some new characters inspired by UW Madison

videoURLs.title: Get Stick Bugged Lol
videoURLs.desc: A silly meme about a dancing stick bug

videoURLs.title: Super Smash UW Edition 2.0
videoURLs.desc: Since Super Smash Bros Ultimate came out recently and the page reached over 20,000 members, I thought it was time to increase the roster with some new characters for the UW edition

videoURLs.title: Alien Dance
videoURLs.desc: One of the greatest traditions in college football history

videoURLs.title: GameCube StartUp
videoURLs.desc: This is what happens when you spill Spotted Cow on your GameCube

videoURLs.title: YouTube Rewind Spring 2019
videoURLs.desc: Hey guys, Eddie here, and I wanted to share with you guys a little video I made that's a recap of last school year's memes. You might even recognize some of your OC in the video that I... ummm... re-purposed (def not stealing). You might also recognize a certain celebrity in the beginning of the video ðŸ˜‰

videoURLs.title: YouTube Rewind Fall 2019
videoURLs.desc: This page has been home to a lot of top tier, high quality memes, and I am incredibly proud to be a part of such community. Keep being awesome you guys. Can't wait to see what else we make fun of in 2020

sections.sectionDesc: I was tasked to make highlight reels for certain players for Forward Madison FC, a professional soccer team within Madison, WI

I was assigned the task of creating two promotional videos for CAMPO, a fair trade company headquartered in Madison. CAMPO specializes in producing alpaca apparel sourced from small businesses in Peru.

videoURLs.title: The Wisconsin Idea
videoURLs.desc: A video showcasing how CAMPO embodies the Wisconsin Idea.

videoURLs.title: Why Alpaca Fiber Is Magical
videoURLs.desc: This video aims to explore the reasons behind CAMPO's utilization of Alpaca Fiber in its clothing line.

sections.sectionDesc: I produced a promotional video for Bandit Tacos, a beloved local taco spot in Madison.

videoURLs.title: Homemade Doesn't Have To Mean Made At Home

advertisement-club-videos.Description: For three semesters, I was involved with UWâ€™s Advertisement Club, where I collaborated with local businesses and organizations in Madison, Wisconsin. During this time, I produced promotional videos for Forward Madison FC, CAMPO, and Porter Coffee House.

videoURLs.title: UW Dining Hall Food Plan Meme
videoURLs.desc: A critique on the UW-Madison Dining Hall Food Plan

videoURLs.title: Finally, "Nice"Weather
videoURLs.desc: It's 40 degrees out! That means it's shorts weather in Wisconsin

videoURLs.title: Wearing Shorts
videoURLs.desc: Wearing Shorts when its barely above freezing is great

videoURLs.title: Super Bowl Halftime Show but make it Wisconsin
videoURLs.desc: An alternative to the Superbowl halftime show that could've made it 100x times better

videoURLs.title: Patrick in Humanities
videoURLs.desc: Are you an actual UW student if you never got lost at the Humanities building?

videoURLs.title: Too Cold For School
videoURLs.desc: It's great to see that after a lot of complaining, UW-Madison finally believes the polar vortex (wind chill of almost -60 F degrees) is enough of a reason to not have class

black-sheep-videos.Description: I interned with the Black Sheep at UW-Madison throughout my second year (2018-2019) to create memes weekly relating to the university and recent events for their Instagram and Twitter accounts.

communication-arts-200-video.Description: In CA 200: Introduction to Digital Communication, I created a video addressing an issue on the UW Campus. Specifically, I highlighted the mandatory meal plan imposed on new incoming students, which limited dining options to campus dining halls only. I explored how this policy heightened the financial strain on students and reduced patronage to local restaurants near the UW campus, impacting businesses with high turnover rates.

communication-arts-155-video.Description: In CA 155: Introduction to Digital Media Production, two fellow students and I collaborated on a comedic video project. The video served as a parody of survival shows, featuring my character, "Eddie McDanger," embarking on a humorous adventure climbing the iconic Bascom Hill on campus.
